body_html: So if I understand correctly, this defaults to /usr/bin/python when we can't find it from explicit configuration. But we don't check whether this actually points to a good python. So this seems more like a bandaid fix rather than getting at the root issue. Am I correct in that analysis? If so, should we at least put a comment in the code saying that this is a hack? I notice in the linked issue you said the root cause may be an upstream issue in bazel.
